name: Knight Boy
description:
have fun with Knight Boy, tackle ten fantastic levels in pure style puzzle game. Collect all the treasures surpassing fearsome zombies. Think of every move you make.

CPU = intel dual core / quad / amd / x2 / x3 / x4 2.60 Ghz

4gb ram

video card = intel Hd 4400 Ati radeon 4670 512 mb / nvidia 9600 GT or higher

remember to install the dxwebsetup included in the package .
